forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.shortForecast: Mostly Cloudy then Chance Rain And Snow Showers
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of rain showers between 1am and 2am, then a chance of rain and snow showers between 2am and 3am, then a chance of rain and snow showers between 3am and 5am, then rain and snow showers likely. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 38. Southwest wind around 2 mph. Chance of precipitation is 60%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Saturday
forecast.shortForecast: Rain And Snow Showers Likely then Chance Rain And Snow Showers
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain and snow showers likely before 7am, then a chance of rain and snow showers between 7am and 3pm. Partly sunny, with a high near 46. West southwest wind 2 to 7 mph. Chance of precipitation is 60%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.
